articles.content: All things are favouring cement at this juncture and we have seen that overcrowded trade in financials just coming to a halt and shifting to material stocks. That is one of the key trade pointers to … [+1462 chars]

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Twitter closes Delhi, Mumbai offices; staff asked to work from home - Rediff.com
articles.description:
Amid layoffs and a severe cost-cutting, Twitter has closed offices in Delhi and Mumbai and asked staff to work from home, according to sources.

The micro-blogging platform's Bengaluru office that largely has engineering staff remains operational, the sources…

articles.author: Ankita Garg
articles.title: Apple fires hundreds of contract workers, company previously assured their jobs were safe - India Today
articles.description: It has now come to light that Apple has fired hundreds of contractor workers who are basically hired by third-party agencies but work with Apple employees on projects.
articles.content: By Ankita Garg: Apple has fired hundreds of contract workers. This might come as a surprise to many, considering the companys CEO Tim Cook recently asserted that layoffs are something that will be a … [+2242 chars]
